mapper.sql: t1.id as "id", t1.version as "version", t1.name as "name", t1.code as "code", t1.parentid as "parentid", t1.level as "level", t1.p_code as "pCode", t1.state as "state", t1.memo as "memo", t1.order_no as "orderNo", t1.keyword as "keyword", t1.del_flag as "delFlag", t1.invalid_time as "invalidTime", t1.date_created as "dateCreated", t1.create_id as "createId", t1.create_ip as "createIp", t1.date_update as "dateUpdate", t1.update_id as "updateId", t1.update_ip as "updateIp"
mapper.insert: insert into t_org_department( id, version, name, code, parentid, level, p_code, state, memo, order_no, keyword, del_flag, invalid_time, date_created, create_id, create_ip, date_update, update_id, update_ip ) values ( #{id}, 0, #{name}, #{code}, #{parentid}, #{level}, #{pCode}, #{state}, #{memo}, #{orderNo}, #{keyword}, '0', #{invalidTime}, now(), #{createId}, #{createIp}, #{dateUpdate}, #{updateId}, #{updateIp} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE version=version+1 ,memo=VALUES(memo) ,update_id=VALUES(update_id) ,update_ip=VALUES(update_ip) ,name=VALUES(name) ,code=VALUES(code) ,parentid=VALUES(parentid) ,level=VALUES(level) ,p_code=VALUES(p_code) ,state=VALUES(state) ,order_no=VALUES(order_no) ,keyword=VALUES(keyword) ,del_flag=VALUES(del_flag) ,invalid_time=VALUES(invalid_time) ,date_update=VALUES(date_update)
